articles.description: Gmail has new sliders on Android tablets, Material Design 3 on iPhones and iPads, and a sidebar Gemini image generator.

articles.title: Those Ikea pieces everyone had in the 1980s are now worth a small fortune. - Farmingdale Observer
articles.description: Vintage Ikea furniture has become surprisingly valuable, with collectors paying premium prices for designs once considered affordable everyday items. The Swedish giant, known for accessible home furnishings, has unwittingly created several iconic pieces that …

articles.title: Many Physical Switch 2 Games Don't Contain The Game At All - Kotaku
articles.description: Nintendo's first-party lineup is avoiding key cards for now, but third-party publishers are embracing them

articles.title: Windows 11 KB5055627 update released with 30 new changes, fixes - BleepingComputer
articles.description: ​​Microsoft has released the KB5055627 preview cumulative update for Windows 11 24H2 with many new features gradually rolling out, and some new bug fixes for everyone.
